snippet: Officials in the movie and television industry say the new gun control laws in New York could prevent them from using lifelike assault weapons and high-capacity firearms. The following are a few famous movies that have prominently featured gun...
lead_paragraph: Officials in the movie and television industry say the new gun control laws in New York could prevent them from using lifelike assault weapons and high-capacity firearms. The following are a few famous movies that have prominently featured gun violence in New York.

headline.main: The Mean Screens of New York
